titleStmt.title: The Repenting sinner pardoned being a brief relation of the wicked life, and penitent pious death of James Wilson of Wolverhampton in Stafford-shire, who died February 21. 1668 / made publick by such as were ear and eye witnesses of the same, for a warning to such as live ungodly.
titleStmt.author: Wilson, James, d. 1668.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
